messages: 17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:02): ok, 22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592; I see IA_WebApps(DOM3)2:00PM scheduled to start now
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:02): Meeting: Web Applications Working Group Teleconference
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (21:02): ok, 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6; the call is being made
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:07): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Many issues resolved in this draft.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:08): ... after review, we will be ready to publish (Working Draft)
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:09): ... would like to go to LCWD in first two weeks of May.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:09): bb21c722adad611b63dfb48ec99e8350: I see setCapture still. Looks to have issues...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:12): bb21c722adad611b63dfb48ec99e8350: Recommend not taking these for D3E -- many unresolved issues...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:16): I am also in favor of postponing this to a future spec.

d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:16): ... many of the use-cases can be handled via the capture phase of the event model. Granted, capturing events over an iframe is not possible, however, we have had known security exploits as a result of this feature in IE.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:19): We all resolve to remove it because it might lead folks to think that it's spec'd somewhere...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:21): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: I think we've already resolved this...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:22): Speced as the eventTarget recieveing focus...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:27): (That's a sample code that "undoes" the check action after the fact, via preventDefault.)
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:27): (This is related to the issue in default actions.)
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:27): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Great. I'll clean this up and keep the wording as-is.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:30): Back to relatedTarget/focus event type...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:30): IE9 is currently reporting the same object for relatedTarget as target. We can adjust this if necessary...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:31): bb21c722adad611b63dfb48ec99e8350: Yes, I don't see why we need to have them both point to the same place...

d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:31): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: OK. I'm changing relatedTarget to be 'null' in cases where the relatedTarget and target are the same in the FocusEvent interface.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:36): Topic: Focus event types interaction (Issue 102)
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:39): Action: 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 to coordinate with WAI with issues of focus.

22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (21:39): Created ACTION-529 - Coordinate with WAI with issues of focus. [on Doug Schepers - due 2010-04-28].
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:48): (back to focus/blur topic... I sent the mail re: this topic on Feb 8, 2010, but it may have been rejected from www-dom. I just resent it to www-archive.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:49): Topic: wheel event, button value
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:50): Firefox: it appears to be 0 (which is the default when no value is assigned)
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:51): Opera: seems kinda random 0's, 1's, and 2's reported...
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:51): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Should there be an associated button?
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (21:52): I like just having button and 'buttons' be zero.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:02): Topic: dead key values during composition
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:06): All the issues listed seem more like a Note than an issue.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:08): Might even get its own section, a la "Considerations for key values in other language bindings"?
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:08): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: Do we need to worry about C/Java interactions?
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:08): ... the implementation will just need to handle it.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:10): ... I'm going to convert these to notes.
d5217991a5c7374b110deb03905676f7 (22:10): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: I think that's the last major issue!
